movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kishore Kumar, Krishna Kishore
Written by: Thatavarthi Kiran
Staring by: Raai Laxmi, Pujita Ponnada, Ram Karthik
Genres: Horror, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Chanti Gadu(Praveen) and Pandu Gadu(Madhu) are two sibling roadside Romeo’s who create a lot of trouble in their village. One fine day, a teacher in the form of Gauri(Lakshmi Rai) comes to their village. Attracted by her, both the brothers try to woo her. But to their shock, they find out that Gauri is a ghost and is after a box which she orders both the brothers to somehow bring from the goons.

movieInfo:
Directed by: R.K Malineni
Written by: A. L. Vijay and Peddinti Ashok Kumar
Starring by: Baby Sara, Rajendra Prasad, Ravi Prakaash
Genres: Drama, Family
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Dhagudu Mootha Dandakor is a thought provoking tale of sensitive family relationships narrated in an entertaining way. The film features Rajendra Prasad and Sara Arjun in the role of grandfather and granddaughter.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anita Udeep
Starring by: Oviya, Bommu Laksmi, Masoom Shankar
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Thamara, Paru, Kajal and Suganya are four friends who are rather tired of their uneventful routine. However, things take a turn for the better with the arrival of a spirited and outgoing young woman named Rita, who encourages them to live their lives to the fullest.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Gopi Ganesh Pattabi
Starring by: Satya Dev, Nanditha
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Utham Kumar(Satyadev) is an intelligent con man, who does high-profile scams by cashing on public beliefs. In that process, he meets Avani (Nanditha Swetha), a dignified and kind-hearted girl and falls in love with her. Moving ahead, Utham crosses paths with a dreaded criminal played by Adithya Menon and fixes a deal for a never before heard scam to settle down in life.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Santhosh P. Jayakumar
Starring by: Bhagyashree Mote, Rajendran, Krishna Murali Posani
Genres: Adult, Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A sexually-starved spirit traps two couples in a bungalow in Bangkok where they have planned to stay for a week. The spirit wants one of the two men to have sex with her. Can they manage to escape?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kanagala Ramesh Chowdary
Starring by: Srinivasa Reddy, Devan, Baburaj
Genres: Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Cheddi Gang is Romance, Thriller Telugu movie released 2019. Its directed by Kanagala Ramesh Chowdary and Srinivasa Reddy, Devan, Baburaj play as lead role in the film.

movieInfo:
Directed by: R. Varun Dora
Starring by: Sujay, Shweta
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Prem, an aspiring entrepreneur is in love with Anjali, his neighbor. Anjali’s parents decide to get her married to a software Engineer. Mythili a friend of Anjali gets pregnant with Anjali’s would-be husband. With the help of their uncle Love Guru Sobhan and friends, Prem and Anjali execute a plan to reveal the truth. What happens to Anjali, Prem and Mythili forms the rest of the story.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Thota Krishna
Starring by: Archana Mosali, Anand Nanda, RK Mama
Genres: Horror
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A newly married couple Arundhati (Archana Mosali) and Jagadeesh (Anand Nanda) move into a newly purchased farm house. Jagadeesh invites his friends for the house warming. Things get weird immediately and Arundhati’s life is endangered. Why this happens and if they manage to come out safe forms the plot of Arundhati Amavasya.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Bala Bodepudi
Starring by: Pranali Ghoghare, Ram Karthik
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Anand “Ram Karthik”, an aspiring young Radio Jackie. One day, one boy called the radio center and told that I am a love failure and now I am going to do suicide. After listing his concern, Anand narrates a love story to keep him away from suicide. He told that story episode wise and his story becomes very popular. Incidentally, this story becomes true in Anand’s life and bring his love “Pranali Ghoghare” closer to him. For finding out his love Anand faces many problems and struggles much. How he found out his love and struggles to make everyone happy, Forms rest of the Story.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vamsi Krishna
Starring by: Sunil, Mannara Chopra, Kabir Duhan Singh
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ganesh aka Jakkanna (Sunil) lives by the motto of “I’ll do anything to help people who helps me” – irrespective of whether they need it. He is on the search for Bairagi (Kabir Singh Duhal) who is the biggest don in Vizag, but no one knows how he looks. When they finally meet, Ganesh vows to help Bairagi out no matter what, which only irritates and ruins the latter’s reputation. Why Ganesh does all this and what it leads to forms the rest of the story.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Panna Royal
Starring by: Kishore Kumar G, Ravi Varma, Mamatha Rahuth
Genres: Horror, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Karthik (Ravi Varma) and Vyshali (Mamatha Rahuth), a newly married couple move into a bungalow and start a happy life. Things take a turn when a Sadhu spots Karthik on road and warns him that he would be killed by his dead wife, now possessed by a ghost after begetting a child through him.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Rushi Krishna
Starring by: Mahadev, Mamata, Sunaina
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Suri, Giri, Venu, Basha and Mallika are friends who grew up together in an orphanage. Mallika is brutally raped by 5 men, leaving her mentally unstable. This incident disturbs all four friends and they decide to avenge.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Harish K.V
Starring by: Prudhviraj, Rakendu Mouli, Kalpika Ganesh
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film is set in Kovuru of Nellore district where two close friends played by Kalyan and Rakendu Mouli get drunk and accidentally get involved in a murder case. They have no money to hire a big lawyer and are forced to bring in a new lawyer named Marthandam(Prudhvi) who is yet to win a case in his life.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Jayashankarr
Starring by: Santosh Sobhan, Riya Suman, Tanya Hope
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ravi(Santosh Shoban) is a paperboy who falls in love with a rich girl called Dharani(Riya Suman). As time passes by, Dharani too gets close to Ravi and convinces her parents for her marriage. The twist in the tale arises when the rich and poor boundaries creep up between the lead pair and the love story is broken midway.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Ponram
Starring by: Sivakarthikeyan, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Napolean
Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The heir of a royal family tries to save his land and villagers from a greedy man. The film begins outlining the sour relationship between the two villages, Singampatti and Puliyampatti. Seema Raja (Sivakarthikeyan) is a jobless youth from Singampatti, born in a family with a long lineage of brave people; the main one being King Kadambavel (Sivakarthikeyan). He does good things in the village for likes on Facebook and pays other villagers to treat him with respect. He hangs around with his sidekick/accountant Kannaku (Soori). The principal from a nearby school invites Seema Raja’s father Ariya Raja (Napoleon) to the awards ceremony at the school. However, due to his father’s busy schedule, Seema Raja offers to go instead. Here, he meets Sunthanthira Selvi (Samantha Akkineni), a sports teacher and Silambam expert, and immediately falls in love with her. He then goes around following her, trying to court her.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Siva Ganesh
Starring by: Tanishq Reddy, Meghla Mukta, Chinna
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Tanishq is a happy go lucky youth who falls in love with Chaitra(Meghla Mukta). Chaitra does not get impressed by the manner in which he teases her and she keeps him away. The moment she starts developing a feeling for him, Chaitra gets kidnapped all of a sudden.
